29#include "../common/common.h"

31/*
32 * ex_mark -- :mark char
33 * :k char
34 * Mark lines.
35 *
36 *
37 * PUBLIC: int ex_mark __P((SCR *, EXCMD *));
38 */
39int
40ex_mark(SCR *sp, EXCMD *cmdp)
41{
42 NEEDFILE(sp, cmdp);
43
44 if (cmdp->argv[0]->len != 1) {
45 msgq(sp, M_ERR, "136|Mark names must be a single character");
46 return (1);
47 }
48 return (mark_set(sp, cmdp->argv[0]->bp[0], &cmdp->addr1, 1));
49}
50
